languageKey.label: Commented record
Displays commented record. Never change this field manually!
Approval status
Approval by system or moderator
Comments must be approved by system or moderator in order to be displayed. Check this box to approve comments.
First name
Commenter's first name.
Last name
Commenter's last name.
E-mail
Commenter's e-mail.
Location
Commenter's location (where he comes from).
Web site
Commenter's web site.
Comment
This is a text as entered by commenter.
IP address
This is the IP address of the host from which this comment was made. If you plan to use this information for access limitation, check that it is not a proxy or you can block lots of innocent people.
TocToc Comments User
The TocToc user id in the format IP.0 or 0.0.0.0.FE-UserID
